languages.text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
languages.original_text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

traits.locale_text: Grants a −20 penalty to any Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Suffers a −20 penalty to any Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, or Agility tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Suffers a −20 penalty to any Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, or Agility tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

languages.text: Erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -20 für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Wurde er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf jede Probe für {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

Erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf jede {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

languages.text: Subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 aux caractéristiques suivantes : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour l'annuler.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 aux caractéristiques suivantes : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour l'annuler.

Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} ou d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour le faire disparaître.

Subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 aux caractéristiques suivantes : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour l'annuler.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}韧性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低20点。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}韧性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低20点。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。

所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}承受−20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。

languages.text: Sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}, la {/g}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}, la {/g}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.

Sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}に−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}判定に-20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。

languages.text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при прохождении любых проверок {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при прохождении любых проверок {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliklerine −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Bu etki, çatışmanın sonunda kalkar. Etkiye çatışma dışında maruz kalındıysa, gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
